page.title: 19THE BROWNIES
page.content: Every Wednesday night at 5.30 we set off for brownies. We do all sorts of things,like working for our badges.We call this journey work.There are three stages, starting on footpath, then onto road, and finally highway.After that you join the guides.In journey work we learn things, like housework, for example. We pay 20p a week subs.If you miss a week,the next week you pay double.Every so often you pay 50p rent. When we come in we play a game like Old Maid,Ladders and Humperty Lumperty and after journey work we play another game.Sometimes we don't do journey work, we sing songs.At other times we go out on the Empire Stone works field.We wear a special uniform.(continued on p.20)
